name: Anhlinh Contact List, Messages, Zalo, Email, Call Button
author: Thanhansoft

sections.installation:
Automatic installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New > Upload and select the anhlinh-contact-list.zip file from your hard disk
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to menu AL Contact List menu in WordPress for custom setting.

Manual installation

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory via ftp
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does this “Anhlinh Contact List” plugin make the page functional?

Are not. Icons use svg code, inline css, and only show when used
sections.description:
List icon button for hotline, messenger, zalo, email. A very simple yet very effective plugin that adds a Call Now button to your website for every device (mobile, table and desktop).

Optimized CSS inline, icon svg, in activate, deactivate, and uninstall plugins.

Arbitrary section 1
